text: Osuchy is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Łukowa, within Biłgoraj County, Lublin Voivodeship, in eastern Poland. It lies approximately north-east of Łukowa, south-east of Biłgoraj, and south of the regional capital Lublin. The village has a population of 155. During World War II the battle of Osuchy took place nearby. ==References== Category:Villages in Biłgoraj County
title: Osuchy
